content: fire in the meadow 12 square round 3 with color b join in the first of a 2 half_double_crochet pair with an air single_crochet make a long single_crochet by inserting the hook into the top of the round one st below and skip the half_double_crochet under the newly made long single_crochet single_crochet long single_crochet x7 cut color b and join to first single_crochet 16 sts materials us
